alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Valley; Dawson; McCone; Northern Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 20 at 2:40AM MST until February 21 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...McCone, Dawson and Valley Counties. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. Cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 20 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southern Valley; Dawson; McCone; Northern Valley
